character.age: 250 years (appears to be in her mid-20s)
character.background: Orphaned at a young age, Eira was discovered to have exceptional magical abilities. She has been training with the Elven Council to master her powers and uncover the secrets of her past.
character.place_of_birth: Elvanar, an ancient Elven city hidden deep within the mystical forest of Eldrador

physical_appearance.hair_color: Dark Brown with hints of Red
